name: DARKSHOT 3D
description:
DARKSHOT 3D is a tiny proof-of-concept game made in Unreal Engine for a summer gamdev camp. It does not reflect what the final product of DARKSHOT, a 2D parkour shooter game, will look like. And there's only three rooms anyway. But hey, if you like it, that's cool.

Music Credit:

Myst on the Moor by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4104-myst-on-the-moor
